ESRS S1-7 Characteristics of non-employee workers in the undertakings’
own workforce
Question ID 33 - Definition of non-employees
Release date
February 2024
Question asked
Which groups can be considered as employees or non-employee workers in line with the German
HGB respectively other national laws?
